$450 for scissor lift certification for 3 people
$500 for handstand canes
$250 for a sound system so we can party on
PerksCheck out our perks! By contributing to our campaign you are making an investment in our future and yours. You can purchase drop-in class passes, monthly memberships, and open play time at The Bird’s Nest. We also have cool t-shirts and stickers for you to show off your circus pride. Larger contributions can get you private parties at our space, performances at your events, and more! If you would like to make a large contribution, please contact us and we would be happy to create a custom package that suits your organization’s needs. We hope that the benefits you receive from contributing from this campaign will be on-going. Read on to discover the meaningful ways we hope to benefit the community.The ImpactIf all this circus stuff seems a little odd to you, you’re probably wondering why we think circus arts are so great, and how they can bring people together. How can the Bird’s Nest make an impact on the greater Buffalo community?
The key philosophies of circus arts as we practice them are trust and communication. These are vital when we work with one another, test our boundaries, and grow our skills. The same tenants apply to growing a community! That’s why the Buffalo Circus community has grown so quickly in just a few years. By opening The Bird’s Nest, we believe we can make circus arts accessible to everyone.
Our Jams are free time in which our space is open to everyone and anyone who wants to come practice, work with new people, and share their skills- at no charge. We will offer weekly jams at no cost because it is an important mainstay in our culture and crucial to welcoming and inclusiveness.
Yoga teaches us to be truthful, kind, peaceful, and mindful. By practicing Yoga and offering classes, we spread these teachings to our greater Buffalo community. We really believe that treating ourselves, our friends, and strangers in this way spreads this message and makes the world a better place.

We all came to circus from different backgrounds: some of us are artists or yogis, some are lawyers or engineers. What unifies us is our willingness to work together and open our hearts and our space to all.
Buffalo is booming with a myriad of talented artists, musicians, dancers, and creators of all kinds! AcroYoga Buffalo is already well-known in the national circus community, but having our own space to practice will make us a world-class destination for famous practitioners of Circus Arts to come and share their knowledge with us. The Bird’s Nest will expand Buffalo’s unique arts scene and contribute to our growing reputation as an incredible city to visit!
Our Business StructureThe Bird's Nest will offer regularly-scheduled classes in all sorts of Circus Arts, as well as yoga, meditation, and dance. Students can pay per class (drop-in classes), purchase a package of classes in a series, or buy memberships that will give them access to classes plus Open Play time. Special workshops will be offered at additional costs, and we hope to host visiting teachers as well. We will also offer donation-based weekly jams, and everyone is invited!We have a large team of awesome teachers at The Bird's Nest who will be paid per class. Eventually we also plan to have a retail area where you can purchase t-shirts, yoga equipment, custom hula hoops, water bottles, and more.We own our building, so we don’t have to worry about rent. We do have bills to pay such as electric, internet, and heating, which will amount to about $450 per month on average. Our taxes are about $3,000 a year, and insurance will be about $8,000 a year.Risks & Challenges/ SafetySafety is important to us! It is only possible for us to excel in our skills and proceed with learning when we know we are safe. The Bird’s Nest is fully insured for all the ways we plan to use it. Our teachers have many years of training and experience teaching and practicing their skills. Our classes always feature a safety component: whenever you learn a new move, you must also learn how to spot it. We never just jump right into a new skill- we believe you have to learn to walk before you can run, and learning the ground-up progression to a new skill is crucial to safely growing your practice. Everything we do is by invitation and not expectation, meaning that you set your own goals and your own boundaries.Other Ways You Can HelpWe believe that whoever you are, you have a unique skill that can help make the community more beautiful. Please contact us at http://acro-wny.org/contact-us.html if this project speaks to you and you want to help in one of the following ways:
Construction and building renovation
Setting up equipment
Clerical work, payroll, employee/scheduling management and organization
Items we need:
yoga mats, blocks, straps, blankets, and bolsters
free weights, rings, TRX, and other workout equipment
cleaning supplies, a vacuum, and carpet shampooer
a refrigerator/freezer
an office desk and filing cabinet
space heaters
laptops

Thank You!We truly appreciate your contribution to building The Bird’s Nest! We promise this will be an enduring place for you to learn, grow, stay healthy, and find peace. We are so excited to see how this project will grow and the many ways in which it will be successful. Thank you for your help in bringing a community circus space to Buffalo!

story:
What is the Hult Prize?

The Hult Prize is a start-up accelerator for social entrepreneurship which brings together the brightest college and university students from around the globe to solve the world’s most pressing issues. The annual initiative is the world’s largest crowdsourcing platform for social good and one of the planet’s leading forces for good.

Participants compete in local events organized on campuses around the world or apply online to partake in the regional finals which are held in five international cities around the world, including: Boston, San Francisco, London, Dubai, Shanghai and on-line. Winning start-ups from each city move onto the Hult Prize Accelerator for the summer before attending the President Bill Clinton hosted global finals, which take place each September at the Clinton Global Initiative annual meeting in New York. Collectively, more than ten thousand students, representing more than 150 countries around the world participate in the Hult Prize and spend over 2 million man-hours on solving the world's most pressing issues. Through crowdsourcing, training, mentorship and funding, the Hult Prize seeks to build and launch the next wave of social entrepreneurs.

Who are we?

Hult Prize Colombia Executive Committee:

  • Jose Fernando Escobar Arias - Managing Principal, Business Incubation at Verizon 
  • Laura Cohen Escobar - Director, Latin America at Harvard Business School
  • Jose Fernando Escobar Escobar - Founder, Foundation Science International

Laura and President Clinton at the first Hult Prize Global Finals way back in 2011.

What We Need

We want to make sure that all students in Colombia can compete in the Hult Prize by removing barriers to entry. We charge no application fee and do not take equity:

  • Your support will go to cover costs for:
    • The Hult Prize Colombia competition lasts a full day and we need to feed the students teams, judges, guest speakers and audience. 
    • Rental fees at the venue.
    • All printed materials for the event such as judge scorecards, student certificates,  and name badges. 
    • Trophies for the winning teams!
    • Photographer and videographer
    • Post event reception or afterparty.
    • Accommodations for 2 top Colombian student teams to compete in Boston in March 2017. 
  • Our top donor will be invited to join the Hult Prize Colombia table at the Hult Prize Global Finals in NYC in September of 2017! You will be able to cheer on your faveorite of the 6 Finalist Teams as President Clinton awards the $1M to the winning team! The winner will be announced on January 14th (amount of donation to be kept confidential if preferred.)
  • Flights for two winning teams from Colombia to Boston are being donated in-kind by Copa Airlines. Thank you! 
  • Thank you to the Stockholm Environmental Institute and Fundacion Science International for being founding sponsors. 
  • Hult Prize Colombia does not take any equity from the participating teams, and there is no entrance fee for students to compete.

story:
We are veterans with a passion for flying drones. We got together with Drone builders experts in their field and Managers that have experience in the entertainment business that showed a passion for our idea. We wanted to give access to young and old and those with disabilities. The consumer family should have live access to pre-programed drone fighters for use in live aerial combat.

Within a protected area with high-end Drones configured with our bubble cage Avoidance System to protect the spectators and the drones from collisions or accidents in flight.

The concept is to build a league with teams of drone fighter pilots competing for rankings to become the World’s Best Fighter Pilots through local, national and with international competitions held globally each year.

Each battle consists of six (6) pilots and lasts about 25 minutes, with 20 minutes of actual fly time in the “Combat Area”.

Each Drone is equipped with dual cameras for 3-D pilot viewing and navigating during combat and lasers which can tag the opponent’s drone, once a drone receives 4 deadly hits, game over, sending the drone back to its landing pad during the remainder of the battle. Professional Controllers have been designed and developed, built to give the maximum control and experience in combat competitions.

Each and every combat of six (6) pilots will be streamed live to screens and shown on the www.ThunderDrone.cc website with each pilot’s standing listed internationally on the ThunderDrone website. Replays will also be available on the YouTube.

Once a year the top pilots from each “Clan” will compete for cash, prizes and world-class sponsorships for their skills.

We need $85,000.00 to finish the bubble cage Avoidance System to complete the Prototype and prove the full system. This will be spent with existing developers of the Flight control system much of it going to university’s in Europe that have subject matter experts and our Joint Venture manufacturers in Bangkok who have supplied drones and tech to NASA and Lockheed Martin.

We are offering free access to live Battle Centres as they become ready around the world.  That’s free live battles as pilots of live drones, which will usually cost $45.00 per go but we are also giving away apparel Caps and T-shirts together with free banners to place on your drone when in combat.

As a contributor you will be automatically entered into the League which will cost others a joining fee.

We have picked only those that have a history of success  for both the software development and the building of our hardware together with a grounding in the entertainments market.

We are using real experience of combat in Battle both in flight and ground to achieve the right level of live realism with todays tech but we need to secure our hardware from real accidents so it can be reused and keep the playing field level. To do that we need our bubble cage avoidance system to be perfected in line with the current tech that we have chosen to fly the drones safely yet in a combat battle.

We have identified the hardware and tech to achieve our goals now we need to finish the software to make it come to reality. That’s where we need your help in this campaign.

If you can't help in funding then please get the word out make some noise in the media like us on Facebook like our YouTube.

Your help is going towards the newest form of drone combat with weapons all LIVE!

story:
> OUR STORY, OUR DREAM

The dream started years ago with our school, Prince of Wales Island International School (which is where I'm from). Our coach, Mr Darren Lim brought World Scholar's Cup into Penang, Malaysia. However, we got absolutely beaten by our Singaporean neighbours on home turf during the early years (remember, Nanyang? 2014 Pwaanang Round?). 

Fast forward to present. In the recent Bangkok Globals of the World Scholar's Cup 2016, we won an astounding 60 gold medals and 100 silver medals for attaining the top 5% out of over 10000 scholars worldwide in academic challenges encompassing debate, writing and quiz challenges! What's even more amazing here is 20 scholars from our school successfully made it to face one final challenge for this season: the prestigious Tournament of Champions at Yale University this November (ft. legendary ukulele master 'Hand Of God, who featured in Malaysia's best talent show performance yet, as well as Aditya in Junior Debate Showcase)! This marks the first time that we have more than 20 scholars flying the Malaysian flag, resounding proof of how much progress we have made through the past three years! 

As a less developed country, Malaysia has not been able to accumulate funds for its scholars for the past few years, even as our academic performance on the world stage improves. As exchange rates and travel costs rise, we are counting on YOU to help make the dream of every Malaysian delegate come true. 


> HELP

Our team is aiming to raise USD 2000 to cover a portion of our total flight cost. The flight cost is estimated to be USD 1000 per person, with the total cost of USD 20000!  However, we are looking at your help to fund only a meager proportion of our flight cost, at a modest USD 100 per participant! 

Share this campaign with your friends and family via Facebook, Twitter or Instagram or any social media platform. Your kind support goes a long way to let dozens of Malaysian scholars compete at the highest level!

For further interest, visit our official website: http://new.scholarscup.org/ 


> WHY HELP

Education is an important experience. Scholars push their intellect to the highest level that they can. The World Scholar's Cup is one such competition which challenges students to explore key concepts, philosophy and issues, looking at perspectives from Aristotle and Assange to exploring contemporary themes such as human rights, climate change and even modern superheroes! . Applying contemporary concepts to classical education, World Scholar's Cup is a community where high level learning is associated with alpacas and Trump.  Our delegation is well versed in techniques enhancing critical thinking and creativity, using them in key skills such as debating and writing.

It is also a true honor to represent one's nation at any international competition. Your support will help us bring Malaysians pride and joy at seeing the youth of their nation standing tall on the shoulders of global academic giants and shall restore their confidence in the abilities of their future generation as well as towards Malaysian education in general.

You can create a better world for Malaysian youth. You can create a better future for Malaysian education. 

Stop hesitating and donate to develop Malaysia. Now.

story:
My name is Brianna Newton, I am 17 years old and live in Brunswick Maine. This summer on  August 31st 2016 I was accepted into the 2017 Winter Intensive Training Program  presented by two time Olympian, Lendon Gray.  The WIT program takes place at Hampton Green Farm in Wellington, Florida from January 3rd-March 28th. This program is not for any typical dressage rider but for young riders who are devoted to being the very best rider they can be.  The days will be filled with rider fitness, theory, riding lessons from not only Lendon but with guest top riders, lectures, and field trips to other top training facilities.

Lendon Gray has represented the United States two times in the Olympics and was voted into the USDF Hall of Fame.  Lendon has devoted her time into promoting young riders. I have been lucky enough to participate in the Weekend Educational  Program, which is a two-day program with lessons from Lendon and educational lectures from guest speakers. I was immediately struck by Lendon’s ability to identify and correct communication break-downs between horse and rider. This experience is what inspired me to apply for the Winter Intensive program. I am one of fourteen riders selected for this opportunity. I will be taking my off the track Thoroughbred mare Justified. She is a 16 hand chestnut who has been competing successfully at training level and schooling first level .  

Dressage is what I love to do and something I hope will be my life and career when I’m older. I hope to someday be in a position to teach other young riders, train horses up to the highest levels in Dressage and compete internationally.

Riding can be a very expensive sport. While I am lucky enough to have the support of dedicated family members this trip will depend largely on fundraising. I plan to volunteer at my local dressage club when I am not competing and to create and sell items at these events to help pay for my trip. I plan to reach out to the community and apply for scholarships to help reach my financial goal. I am learning to coordinate and organize small fundraising events which have been very educational.

I am hoping there are those of you out there who wish to contribute to the sport in general, and through me, to young riders everywhere. My goal is to raise $15,000 through indiegogo which will be used to pay for room and board, training and living expensive down in Wellington.

Thank you for taking the time to read about Justy and I. Thank you in advance for your contribution.

story:
Why to Read: 10 Reasons Why Reading Books Will Save Your Life

http://whytoread.com/why-to-read-10-reasons-why-reading-books-will-save-your-life/

 

Why To Read 10 : Reasons Why Reading Books Will Save Your Life

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1zFnXqgGYmk

 

 

Transforming Attitudes, Minds, and Lives through Reading “The Greatest Inspirations”

We all know that reading is important and it has many benefits towards children, teenagers, and adults. Some children live poorly so that they or their parents cannot afford purchasing books for them. Let’s support them with inspirational and motivational books that will be useful for these children, parents, teachers, and others in the environment. You are certainly welcome to get copies of this lovely book for yourself and others. If you have no time or interest to read or have plenty of books already, you may support children and teenagers with copies of this meaningful book. I am sure they will be very grateful for your kindness.

 

Why Reading Is Important

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rTPLezHxZRQ

 

Dedication

 “The Greatest Inspirations” is especially dedicated to everyone who is enthusiastic about becoming a better person and making this world a better place to live. This book will certainly have positive impacts to anyone who reads it, to the local and international communities.

 

Contents

There are 40 important topics in this lovely book. The topics are relevant to everyone in these times of turbulent, changing and challenging. There are various topics inside and each topic is mostly one-page length. A few topics are two-page length.

You may read and enjoy it during breaks and while you are waiting in a queue in a bank or post office or office or anywhere else. You need not to devote certain times to read.

Contents of my book are suitable for people from various backgrounds such as accountants, auditors, architects, artists, engineers, IT people, marketers, lawyers, bankers, insurance people, business people, entrepreneurs, housewives, teachers, headmasters, lecturers, professors, students (even by second, third, fourth, fifth, and sixth grade of elementary school children), leaders, ministers, politicians, notary, ordinary people, and others.

This inspiring and interesting book will ultimately make you more successful and joyful in personal & professional lives. Further, it will make you to to have more peaceful, meaningful, and wonderful life.

Reading is much better than watching TV. Reading will broaden and widen your mind and perspective.  Reading will possibly make you more creative, imaginative, and innovative.

 

Why You Should Read

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WFHyN8EouE4

 

Options

You have 2 options:

  1. Make a contribution for yourself. You will receive copy or copies of the book for yourself and/or meaningful gifts for yourself, loved ones, relatives, faithful friends, valued customers, loyal colleagues, special clients, meaningful associates, reliable business partners, and so on.
  2. Make a contribution for others. If you do not wish to receive copy or copies of the book, we may arrange to give it to anyone in nearby community such as children or teenagers in schools or orphanages or adults in nursing homes or libraries, to those who are disadvantaged, etc. 

 

Shipping & handling charges also insurance will be added on the top of the total price (unit price * number of copy). We recommend at least 2 or 3 copies. This way, we may save on the shipping and handling charges.

 

Contribution Appearance

You may choose whether your name will be displayed publicly next to your contribution on the campaign page or remain anonymous.

 

11 Positive Benefits Of Reading

https://selfhelpfix.com/benefits-of-reading.php

6) All Leaders And Successful People Read

Books are very powerful, they change and transform lives. Nearly all successful people will tell you that there is at least one book that they read that completely turned around and transformed their life.

 

Benefits of Reading: Getting Smart, Thin, Healthy, Happy

A love of reading can protect your brain from Alzheimer’s disease, slash stress levels, encourage positive thinking, and fortify friendships. Here's how your brain and body benefit when you crack open a book.

http://www.rd.com/health/wellness/benefits-of-reading/

 

 

[BBC] Why Reading Matters [Part 1 of 6]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QdwFFFBCPzw

 

[BBC] Why Reading Matters [Part 2 of 6]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dt4_czM-UuM

 

[BBC] Why Reading Matters [Part 3 of 6]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lFlTV_OPh1I

 

[BBC] Why Reading Matters [Part 4 of 6]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=x0WDLsIZuZg&amp...

 

[BBC] Why Reading Matters [Part 5 of 6]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JuCtHUDW4fw

 

[BBC] Why Reading Matters [Part 6 of 6]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Owdqz8y98-0

 

 

 

8 Science-Backed Reasons to Read a (Real) Book

Bookworms can see some serious perks to their health and happiness. Want to really reap the benefits of reading? Reach for an old-fashioned, printed book.

http://www.realsimple.com/health/preventative-health/benefits-of-reading-real-books

 

Book smart: the unexpected health benefits of being an avid reader

http://www.stylist.co.uk/books/unexpected-health-benefits-of-reading-fiction-books-reading-survey-stress-brain-agility

Health benefits: the differences between actual books and eBooks

Data is still emerging on this relatively new topic, but research so far seems to indicate that the health benefits of reading can be negated in digital books.

For example, reading a book has long been associated with one of the routines that leads to better sleep quality. However, a study out last year found that reading from a tablet or iPad before bedtime may actually disrupt sleep quality …

 

The importance of reading books - The one thing

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ou03Q2dhLcM

 

6 Habits of Highly Successful People Before Bedtime

http://www.lifehack.org/articles/productivity/6-habits-highly-successful-people-before-bedtime.html

Here are six bedtime habits of highly successful people.

1. Read for an hour

Microsoft billionaire Bill Gates is an avid reader. Each night before bed, he spends an hour reading a book, ranging on topics from politics to current events.

 

Warren Buffett on the Key to Success

http://propelu.com/1673/warren-buffetts-master-key-success/

A Forbes Magazine study found that 88% millionaires and billionaires read 30 minutes or more each day.

He held up a stack of reports and trade publications he had brought with him and said “Read 500 pages like this every day.” That’s right, read 500 pages a day and he went on to say “That’s how knowledge works. It builds up like compound interest. All of you can do it, but I guarantee not many of you will do it.”

 

How To Read A Book In 10 Minutes

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=24KnwTepKdU

 

If you want to be like Warren Buffett and Bill Gates adopt their voracious reading habits

http://qz.com/668514/if-you-want-to-be-like-warren-buffett-and-bill-gates-adopt-their-voracious-reading-habits/

Want to know one habit ultra-successful people have in common?

They read. A lot.

 

7 Habits You Should Learn From Successful People

http://www.lifehack.org/301984/7-habits-you-should-learn-from-successful-people

They read a lot

Not every person that reads a lot is a leader. But every leader is a reader.

 

Taking Up These 10 Hobbies that Make You Smarter

http://www.lifehack.org/310690/taking-these-10-hobbies-will-make-you-smarter

2. Read voraciously.

 

Asia's Richest Man Li Ka-Shing Shares 7 Timeless Pieces of Advice for Your Entrepreneurs

http://www.keepinspiring.me/asias-richest-man-li-ka-shing-shares-7-timeless-advice-for-young-entrepreneurs/

6. Cultivate An Insatiable Appetite For Reading

"If I have a rare vocation, I will spend it reading," admits Ka-Shing.

 

*************************************************************************

Comments or Opinions or Thoughts

”I have had the opportunity to know Listiani very well and I know that you will be as excited as I was to read her works. You will find her insights and writings to be very open, honest, and refreshing, much like a young child who discovers the joy of walking alone for the very first time. As you read through her feelings you will be able to enjoy that pleasure in your life, not merely as a spectator, but as a participant in life once again.”

~ Exclusive Agent, Insurance Company

 

“Great collections! I am very impressed. Listiani’s book truly contains the greatest inspirations and thoughts that are really relevant to anyone in nearly any situation. I highly recommend this wonderful book to anyone.”

~ Internetworking Engineer

 

“Listi’s poetry is indicative of her natural qualities as a person; graceful, worldly, optimistic, inquisitive, and wise beyond her years. You can tell that her writings flow easy from her heart and soul, and are relevant to us all, no matter who we are. I have always learned much from Listi regarding how we should live life, and believe that her poetry can speak to us all during these changing and turbulent times. Poets like Listi are hidden gems that can speak to our humanity, when we find them.”

~ Researcher, Author, & Supply Chain Leader​

 

Poetry is a very personal activity.  It does not have to be written on paper – some of us create it while singing in the shower; others do it on the sports field; still others do it through art or crafts.  We write poetry in the living of our lives and the telling of our personal stories… 

This very act of making thoughts concrete, whether they lyrically soar or simply repeat in chorus, is an act of willpower that should be respected, if not honored.  This would be a very different world if more of us made the effort to write out our poetry rather than passively experience life from in front of the TV tube.          

Listiani shares with us in this collection a bit of her soul and feelings.  … they are a straightforward examination of life as experienced by a thinking adult.  And, like all of our lives, sometimes they soar and sometimes they dip, but always they bear us along in her song.

~ Senior Director

 

“Listiani’s work touches on thoughts and feelings common to everyone around the world. Perhaps by focusing more on these issues there could be greater peace for us all.”

~ Director, International Alumni Relations

 

“The poems in this book were written about everyday experiences, about everyday life by a person who understands intimately the everydayness of two cultures. She beautifully and thoughtfully shows us that we are all, indeed, one; that life is beautiful and sad also awe inspiring to all peoples in the same way, no matter what your cultural background. “

~ Director, Relocation Services, Real Estate Company, Realtor, Gardener, and Painter

 

Listiani’s poems are very thought provoking and are filled with passion. Very nice and I am really amazed with her talents!” “

~ Marketing Coordinator, Foreign Trade Institute

 

“Listiani was one of my students in the business school. She came to class each day and participated with the best of them. It is only now that I realize what other talents and insights she possessed, and how blind I was to not know they were there all the time.”

~ Clinical Professor, Information Technology and Electronic Commerce and Director, Center for the Study of Electronic Commerce

 

True, Passionate Learners

To many who have never taught, the art of teaching appears to be a one-way proposition from teacher to student.  In reality, the best learning experiences are those where a two-way flow of understanding emerges and the joy of discovery is shared equally.  The ones who make such a shared experience possible are students who eagerly seek out knowledge, who think about what they do not know, and move to complete their own personal picture of the world and its wonders… 

            Listiani is one of these few.  I came to know her determination as her teacher while at the Business School.  Idle or passing comments about this or that would engage the imagination of the class for a few moments, except for Listi who would come to the next session with articles and materials she had collected because of her curiosity and drive...

Now I have read her poetry.  From it I can see what she sees: the beauty in all things, the big, the small, the everyday, and the unimaginable.

            True, passionate learners never stop pushing themselves to discover the wisdoms around them and see art and poetry in all things.  After a while, they understand that the compartments of knowledge are arbitrary and artificial.  From such a perspective, one can readily see that what we call music, mathematics, science, art, philosophy, history, and so on are one and the same.  It is from this perspective that her poetry should be viewed and enjoyed.

~ Consultant and Lecturer

 

“Listiani is a woman at peace. She has a serene view of the world; one that many of us could benefit from. Her poetry reflects the realities as well as the opportunities in our lives and allows us time to reflect on her message.”

~ Former Administrative Director, Gardener, Cyclist, and Conversationalist

 

“Her poetry is a reflection of her intelligence, wisdom, and understanding. I am always thrilled to read her new poem. I believe you will enjoy and learn a lot from reading her writings.”

~ Head of Institutional Sales & Development, Insurance Company

 

“In Listiani’s poems, she illustrates the value of a life and the opportunity each life brings. She carries hope and optimism in an uncertain time. The poems show recognition of beauty within herself, in others, and in the world around her. “

~ "Owner and Artist" of Sandesigns

 

“Listiani has written a most definitely lovely book. I carry it in my briefcase to work, and read it often during breaks and over lunch, even while I am waiting at a traffic light. I have had a lot of stress in my life recently and reading Listiani's poetry helps me to relax and realize that life is so simple, and that it doesn’t make sense to worry about things out of our control. Listiani has captured the basic human spirit and her book helps to restore a weary soul. Basically, the thoughtfulness that Listiani have devoted to her book reminds me of humanity. So many people forget about the importance of common humanity and she has rekindled the genuine feelings of being true, honest, sincere, and kind. She is obviously enjoying life to the fullest and her understanding of life provides a very good example to others. She is such a talented individual and her pure heart makes me so glad that we remain friends.  I can’t wait for her next book.”

~ Vice President of Development & Construction, MBA (Master of Business Administration), MIM (Master of International Management), and entrepreneur

 

“ Listiani’s poems are very thoughtful and I am enjoying them.  I will surely share this book with others. The ordering process is very smooth and efficient.  I wish her great success as she moves ahead with her aspirations.”

~ CPA (Certified Public Accountant) & Auditor

 

“Listiani is certainly blessed with a gift of writing. Poetry is a way that Listiani has chosen to communicate her innermost thoughts about various subjects. While living in Denver, I had the pleasure of meeting Listiani and thoroughly enjoyed becoming one of her best friends for life. I know deep down that she has written a lot of her poems based on our friendship and experiences together which will always have a special place in my heart. Listiani is a true inspiration to people reading her poetry. Enjoy!”

~ IT Consultant

 

“All topics in this book are very important to us all. This book has truly helped me when I was deeply depressed. Hopefully, this book will also help and bless others.

~ Marketing Manager

 

Listiani is an author with a great work. The Greatest Inspirations is a series of poem that is not only as work of art, but also a source of thoughts and ideas related to our daily life. It is written in beautiful language yet very easy to be understood so that anyone can absorb and catch the meaning that will be delivered through beautiful words. Every poem will inspire the born of the new inspirations and will make us realize that there are valuable phenomenons around us that have been disregarded thus far. Listiani has packed all as carefully and thoughtfully in writings that are comfortable and easy to follow. The strength of every poem is on the power of narration that will make this poem so enjoyable to be read at any occasion. The reader can follow the descriptive-explorative and will just flow in hidden messages without feel bored of following page by page so that when the book is finished to be read, we feel that we do not want to end the reading. Reading it again and again is not boring at all, for every time the same poem is read, miraculously there will a different variant of inspiration comes out from time to time.


The Greatest Inspirations is the most wonderful book I'd ever read.  This book is worth owning for personal collection and also for the inspiration source to nourish the soul.

~ Architect, marketer, and writer

 

This is an inspiring and interesting book that contains collection of wise words. They are simple yet very meaningful.

~ Law scholar, civil engineer, and doctor

 

I really enjoy reading this book as the contents are so refreshing and relaxing. They calm my mind and soul.

~ Architect

 

Excellent! I am really impressed. This book is useful for my family and I also everyone else. I would highly recommend others to read it.

~ An entrepreneur, a businessman, and furniture exporter

 

The topics are mostly good and suitable for the morning briefings in the office, in order to encourage and motivate the teamwork to work and perform better, try to achieve the unbelievable targets, and to inspire them to do the business in different ways beyond their imaginations.    

~ Banker and Senior Marketing Manager

 

The contents of the book can be utilized to practically and peacefully resolve the problems at organizations, institutions, and companies.

~ Businessman and entrepreneur

 

This book is very lovely, interesting, inspiring, motivating, and useful for us all.

~ Board of director and owner of international schools (preschool, kindergarten, elementary, secondary, and high schools) with Cambridge Certificates.

 

I have found the two poems in your cooking book. The first one “Cooking meals and playing sports are somehow similar” is a smart and fun poem. It really shows that cooking and sports have a lot in common even if it is two different activities. Also, after reading the poem and thinking for a while I realized that cooking is really a sport The second poem “Using a cooking analogy” is now one of my favorite poems of yours. It made me think that it is important that we mix the right things to have a fun, exciting, and love filled life. It is up to oneself what type of ingredients that one mixes.  I must say once again that I love your poems. They are simple but yet so meaningful. And actually if you spend some time thinking about the meaning behind each of them they are not as simple as you thought from the beginning. What I really like from your poems is that they make me think in so many new ways.  Also they make me think about so many new things.  

~ A Swedish lady who loves to travel and enjoy healthy food

 

*************************************************************************

 

Wonderful Gifts for Everyone for Any Occasions, Reasons, and Seasons

Copies of this book can be wonderful gifts for everyone for any occasions, reasons, and seasons.

 

Further, they are be suitable gifts for birthdays, anniversaries, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year, friendship, weddings, spring, summer, autumn, winter, and so on for you, loved ones, relatives, faithful friends, and so forth. Furthermore, copies of this book will be suitable for valued customers, loyal colleagues, special clients, meaningful associates, and reliable business partners for appreciating and thanking past and present businesses and for encouraging, enhancing, and motivating future businesses. They will really appreciate your thoughtfulness.

Copies of this book will comfort, encourage, inspire, and motivate those who are discouraged, disappointed, and distressed. In short, it may be utilize as “natural anti-depressant” which is better and safer than chemical ones.

 

Please feel free to share with others and encourage them to support this to their best and utmost abilities. Thank you very much for your kindness and support.

 

Should you have any question, please don’t hesitate to contact me at dirtomo2012@yahoo.com  For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. Your prompt & positive response is certainly appreciated.

 

Best regards & wishes,

~ Listiani ~

What I really like from your poems is that they make me think in so many new ways.  Also they make me think about so many new things.  ~ A Swedish lady who loves to travel and enjoy healthy food ************************************************************************* Wonderful Gifts for Everyone for Any Occasions, Reasons, and SeasonsCopies of this book can be wonderful gifts for everyone for any occasions, reasons, and seasons. Further, they are be suitable gifts for birthdays, anniversaries, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, New Year, friendship, weddings, spring, summer, autumn, winter, and so on for you, loved ones, relatives, faithful friends, and so forth. Furthermore, copies of this book will be suitable for valued customers, loyal colleagues, special clients, meaningful associates, and reliable business partners for appreciating and thanking past and present businesses and for encouraging, enhancing, and motivating future businesses. They will really appreciate your thoughtfulness.Copies of this book will comfort, encourage, inspire, and motivate those who are discouraged, disappointed, and distressed. In short, it may be utilize as “natural anti-depressant” which is better and safer than chemical ones. Please feel free to share with others and encourage them to support this to their best and utmost abilities. Thank you very much for your kindness and support. Should you have any question, please don’t hesitate to contact me at dirtomo2012@yahoo.com  For questions related to the Indiegogo campaign, you can contact support@indiegogo.com. Your prompt & positive response is certainly appreciated. Best regards & wishes,~ Listiani ~

story:
We present www.digitalibook.com site, which can become a free electronic library with your help. 

The electronic books made by us can be read through any device (you can follow some examples in our site). 

The e-books are very popular today but most of them are paid. We want to create a free platform which can be used by everyone. We have a specific software, which can easily create Digital books.

  We want to put more than 10,000 free e-books in all genres in our site.  Further, in addition to English books in our Free Library we will add books in Russian, French, Spanish and several other languages. 

We hope that each of you will have a small part in this wonderful project.

If you have any question, you can write us by e-mail or via facebook.

Digitalibook offers an online service to turn PDF to page flipping eBook. Upload your PDF and publish as online eBooks with page turning effect

With Digitalibook PDF files are converted into page flipping eBooks using our proprietary process technology. Turn your plain PDF documents into dynamic page flipping eBook and view the content like vivid papers.

The new created page flipping eBook allows users to read on PC, Mac, Linux, Unix and many other mobile systems such as iOS, Android, Windows, Blackberry, etc.

Features: 
1. Converts PDFs into eBooks including:
Catalogs, Manuals, Flyers, Reports, White Papers, Newsletters, Brochures, Magazines, Photo Albums. 
2. Working independently of Adobe PDF reader.
3. Streaming loads pages.
4. Viewers have options to zoom with variable resolution.
5. HTML5 supported for iPad, iPhone, Android and other mobile systems.
6. Instant modifier.

DIY your own e-book and share with your friends, company partners, clients now. 
Digitalibook is a platform for authors that can make their books in an ibook format .
This is the best technology platform to distribute your books and catalog to world wide.
Retail and whole sale market.


Why Digitalibook…
Your audiences go everywhere, Digitalibook gives the possibility for them to read flipbooks at anywhere on any device. 
• Desktop
• Laptop
• Tablets
• Smart phones

3D Page Flipping styles
Digitalibook converts your existing PDF as online magazine with stunning 3D page turning effect, then streaming access it with various devices such as PC, Mac, iPad, Android phones, tablets, etc. 
Digitalibook offers optional page reading styles depends on your publication type.

True 3D page flipping solution
Pages are shown facing in screen, like a real expanded book, created in real 3D effect and shadows. It is recommended if your e-magazine is a mixture of pictures and text contents.

Reading flipping solution
Pages are initially shown facing, and showing single page when zoomed in, scroll mouse wheel to pan page, best for mixed contents but comparable more texts in pages.

Plain reading solution
EBook created in plain reading style, it is good for mainly texts in the eBook, users scroll mouse wheel to read. No page 3D page turning effects for this mode.

Texts and vector graphics remain clear in the Digitalibook page flipping publication, and don’t go pixilated.
Raster images barely lose resolution during PDF to flash page flipping conversions (the converted image quality depends on the raster image quality in PDF).
Compared with solutions using only raster images, vector type of contents makes eBook files much smaller in size, faster to data travel over network and quicker to see first page of your online eBooks.

Rich contents for eBook
Rich type of contents are supported by Digitalibook, texts with multitype of fonts, images with transparency, PDF bookmark, hyper links, video clips, audio embeded, such PDF contents are well converted, or can be added to the page flipping book.

Hyperlinks supported
Hyperlinks are automatically detected and converted. Both internal, external and email links are supported.

Background music optional
Digitalibook allows to play an audio file as the eBook background music. Automatic play back is featured.

Searchable contents
Texts in PDF are converted as searchable texts in flash, audience can easily search and locate the page that contains the string they are looking for.

Bookmark/Table of content 
Automatically imports PDF bookmark as table of contents, or, you can create and modify the table of content for your eBook.

Lets Google index your eBook
Digitalibook creates SEO, search engine optimization – typically Google friendly online magazine, all text information can be indexed and searched by Google, this gets your eBook more exposures and helps your potential audience find your publication with keywords. Kindly please note it may take time for search engine spider to scan and find your publication.

Google Analytics ready 
You can set online publication with your Google Analytics UA, this enables tractable eBook access, referrals, traffic and many more. It is very detailed and graphical report to show where your audiences are from, and how they like your eBook. Please find 
publication is created in flash formats, this ensures it’s accessibility on both PC/Mac and iPad/Android.

Digitalibook showing flash format eBook for PC / Mac
Flash has the ability to result in a crisper and generally more pleasant appearance of files and this is why when your audiences have a robust CPU, flash contents are recommended. Using flash, Digitalibook displays flawless images with high-definition resolutions.

Digitalibook showing format eBook iPad/Android
Mobile devices such as iPad/Android won’t work with flash

Off-line sharing features 
If you need to send out your catalog or brochure within CDs or USB drive , unlike online contents, offline sharing has no worry of bandwidth, but it requires single .exe (Pro version only) to execute, or auto-run when insert a CD. In this way, your customer will see vivid 3D page flipping brochure, just like a physical one.

Easy to Publish
Last but not least, we want your publication to be best in appearance and can be accessible online. 
 

Publication with Share button
Social network sharing helps to get more audiences. Twitter, Facebook, Google plus and email options are provided.

story:
The School Bus Project

The School Bus Project is a team, a family, a crowd responding to the needs of fellow human beings. Mobile education where it is needed. It's that simple.

What We Need the money for 

  • In the last year, we have raised around £50,000.
  • It paid for learning resources and for refugees to enjoy new learning opportunities
  • It paid for our team to do the pilot work, for the Big Yellow Bus to be our first mobile school.
  • We need funds for our 2017 programme
    • to cover the cost of training more volunteers
    • to enable us to set up and support new outreach teams
    • to buy resources and kit for some of the less hospitable camps and refugee centres
    • to buy and adapt more vehicles which can serve as mobile schools or classrooms
  • We need offers of help as well - the Little Red Minibus was provided for us to use by one of our partners, free of charge.
  • If we get part way to our target, we will do part of the job.

What difference does it make?

The world seems a little harsh right now.  We seem often to be divided from each other, when in reality we share a great deal in common.  Children and families generally care for each other, cling to their security wherever they live.  In this case, we are working to support people whose lives have been torn apart, through no fault of their own.

  • Education is a basic human right, set out in Article 26 of the Declaration of Human Rights
  • We want to make that right a reality.
  • You can be part of making a real difference by helping The School Bus Project

Risks & Challenges

The project is a complicated one, but we have learned a lot about what makes it work and what we need to do better.  We have formed a charity, so that we can be accountable for our work and so that everyone knows we will work hard to do what we have promised.

Even if you can't spare any money at the moment, we appreciate your interest.

Perhaps you can help yourself by setting up a project team - or just spread the word for us..

Here are some other ideas for you. 

  • Follow us on Twitter @article26sbp
  • Try out our e-learning training course, which you can find on our website
  • Consider a fundraising event - let us know and we will do our best to help you with it
  • Mention us on your Facebook Account

story:
Entre2classes.com est le site qui favorise les échanges internationaux entre classes du niveau primaire ou secondaire. Le site est issu de la refonte du site Prof_inet.com qui durant des années a permis à des élèves du monde entier de communiquer entre eux par la télé-collaboration soit en utilisant des moyens électroniques(email, skype...).

Les projets sont présentés par des enseignants du monde francophone. Ils n'ont qu'à compléter le formulaire disponible sur le site. Nous nous chargeons de le publier sur le site et sur les réseaux sociaux Facebook et Twitter du site.

Le rôle de entre2classes.com est de mettre en contact des classes de pays différents pour permettre aux élèves d'échanger sur leur culture, leurs traditions ou tout autre sujet choisi par l'enseignant qui présente le projet.

La banque de projets contient 247 projets provenant de 30 pays sur 4 continents.

Le financement acquis via ce programme servira à payer les frais d'hébergement du site,  publier les projets sur le site et les afficher sur les réseaux sociaux, trouver des moyens de publiciser le site et améliorer sa visibilité et son référencement.

Venez nous visiter sur www.entre2classes.com et encouragez-nous!

story:
Artistes Urbains est née de la volonté d'aider les jeunes à s'exprimer par l'écriture et les arts. Notre objectif est aussi de favoriser la persévérance scolaire et contrer le décrochage par des ateliers d'écritures ainsi que par l’amélioration du lien d'appartenance des jeunes à leur école en offrant à ceux-ci la possibilité de participer  à un projet artistique intéressant, motivant et valorisant. Artistes urbains permet aux jeunes de se réaliser, de relever des défis et de s'accomplir.

La première partie du projet est d'offrir un atelier d’écriture aux étudiants du secondaire régulier ou en adaptation scolaire qui est animé par COBNA, le porte-parole et Fondateur du projet et artiste hip-hop Québecois.

​La deuxième partie du projet consiste à organiser un spectacle dans lequel les jeunes pourront démontrer leurs talents. Ils pourront ainsi se produire devant les étudiants de leur école, en interprétant leurs propres compositions.

Nous croyons que dans le contexte actuel des coupures en éducation, les jeunes ont besoin de votre aide maintenant plus que jamais. Artistes Urbains finance 50% des projets par lui même. Vos dons nous permettront de financer plus de projets et d'en faire bénéficier à plus de jeunes.

Consultez la liste de nos cadeaux et faites votre don!

story:
On October 12, 2015, Dr. Jamie Lauren Zimmerman, 31, attempted to cross the mouth of the Lumahai River on Kauai, Hawaii and was tragically swept out to sea by a rogue wave.  Lifeguards stationed at another beach as well as island paramedics rushed to rescue Jamie, but were unable to resuscitate her. 


Our Purpose

Sadly, this was not the first death at this location.  Due to constraints on funding, signage does not warn of the extreme danger lurking there and there are no lifeguards assigned to that beach. In Jamie’s memory her family has committed to do all we can to ensure that others do not lose their lives at Lumahai and adjacent remote beaches on the North Shore of Kauai.

Funds raised by this campaign would be used by the County of Kauai to create and install prominent warning signs using Google Earth color photos to describe the hazards associated with rip currents and rogue waves at a particular location. Additionally, these signs would provide important lifesaving information. If sufficient funds are raised, the County of Kauai would create a roving lifeguard program, which, according to the County of Kauai Ocean Safety Division, would be the most feasible, expedient safety improvement plan considering the current fiscal climate.

Under the roving lifeguard program, a staffed lifeguard vehicle would rove unguarded beaches during times of the year when seasonal ocean conditions dictate that accidents are more prone to occur at those locations. Having a full-time roving lifeguard vehicle, complete with lifesaving equipment, a jet ski, an ATV, etc. would prevent many drownings at unprotected beaches, including Lumahai. A roving lifeguard program, already in place on the island of Oahu for the last several years, has proven to be an extremely valuable addition to existing stationery lifeguard towers. In fact, had a roving lifeguard program been in place for Lumahai and adjacent beaches prior to October 12th, perhaps Jamie’s tragic drowning could have been averted.

Additional contributions would be used to provide seed money to the Kauai Lifeguards Association (KLA),a 501(c)(3) charitable organization working to make Hawaii’s waters safe, to establish a “Jamie’s Heroes” award program that would honor monthly a professional lifeguard, surfer, or beachgoer who saves a person from drowning. In conjunction with each award there will be a widespread electronic and print media campaign with the express goal of educating island residents and visitors about ocean safety awareness. Additionally, all awardees would be honored at the annual KLA Ocean Safety Campaign event, which also would be widely publicized. Any additional monies raised that exceed our stated goal would be used to help fund a nonprofit foundation that would further Jamie’s vision of promoting mindfulness and service to those in need, both domestically and around the world.

The Safety Project

Kauai ocean safety officials have provided the following estimated budget items for signage and the roving lifeguard program:

Signage  10,000

Roving Lifeguard Vehicle  $45,000

Rescue Jet Ski and Trailer  $24,000

Response ATV  $10,000

Binoculars, Bullhorn, and Related Supplies  $5,000

Radio Equipment  $1,000

Vehicle Fuel and Maintenance  $5,000

The Ocean Safety Awareness Project  $25,000

TOTAL  $125,000

Continuing the Commitment to Serve

Jamie dedicated her life to helping people. The campaign to improve safety and avoid other deaths at this beautiful but lethal site and other remote beaches honors Jamie’s beliefs that every life matters and every act of service has a ripple effect.

Jamie's Work

Jamie was a medical doctor and reporter for ABC’s Medical Unit who dedicated her life to helping people in need. She was published in many media outlets, including the Huffington Post, PBS, MindBodyGreen, Sonima, and Yahoo News. Recently she gave a poignant talk entitled “The Power of the Gap” at TEDx Bushwick 2015. Among the service she performed, Jamie helped Congolese refugees in Zambia, volunteered in a hospital in India, and built classrooms in Uganda. She also worked with indigenous people on the Amazon River in Peru and served as a United Nations Global Health representative in Haiti.

Passionate about teaching mindfulness and helping people lead purpose-driven lives, Jamie lectured widely on the intersection between medicine and meditation. She worked with Deepak Chopra and led meditation sessions for her colleagues at ABC News, Congressional staff on Capitol Hill in DC, and hundreds of others. Jamie also worked with The (Goldie) Hawn Foundation, training educators and school administrators to teach meditation to children. 

Jamie's Legacy

Jamie connected people with themselves and with each other. She studied the medical basis for mindfulness’ effectiveness and how meditation rewires the brain, using that knowledge as a tool that not only heals the individual, but also enables people to help others.

She would tell us to STOP: Stop, Take deep breaths, Observe our emotions, and Proceed in a way that supports our highest intentions. 

Jamie believed that for every crisis in our lives there is both the danger of falling into emotional reactivity and also the opportunity to pause, get in the gap, and choose our highest response. She saw every crisis as an opportunity, “crisi-tunity," as she called it.   Jamie seized every opportunity to help others, from her work in global health to her passion for teaching mindfulness. Her expansive heart and expansive dreams energized us to be our best selves. We sincerely hope that Jamie’s life will inspire you to take action now to make the world a more open, safe, healthy, and loving place.  

To learn more about Jamie's lifework, please check out her website and YouTube page.

people in need. She was published in many media outlets, including the
Huffington Post, PBS, MindBodyGreen, Sonima, and Yahoo News. Recently she gave
a poignant talk entitled “The Power of the Gap” at TEDx Bushwick 2015. Among
the service she performed, Jamie helped Congolese refugees in Zambia,
volunteered in a hospital in India, and built classrooms in Uganda. She also
worked with indigenous people on the Amazon River in Peru and served as a
United Nations Global Health representative in Haiti.
Passionate
about teaching mindfulness and helping people lead purpose-driven lives, Jamie lectured widely on the intersection between medicine
and meditation. She worked with Deepak
Chopra and led meditation
sessions for her colleagues at ABC
News, Congressional staff on
Capitol Hill in DC, and hundreds of others. Jamie also worked with The (Goldie)
Hawn Foundation, training educators and school administrators to teach
meditation to children. 
Jamie's Legacy

Jamie connected people
with themselves and with each other. She studied the medical basis for
mindfulness’ effectiveness and how meditation rewires the brain, using that
knowledge as a tool that not only heals the individual, but also enables people to help
others.
She
would tell us to STOP: Stop,
Take deep breaths, Observe our emotions, and Proceed in a
way that supports our highest intentions. 
Jamie believed that
for every crisis in our lives there is both the danger of falling into
emotional reactivity and also the opportunity to pause, get in the gap, and
choose our highest response. She saw every crisis as an opportunity,
“crisi-tunity," as she called it.   Jamie seized every opportunity
to help others, from her work in global health to her passion for teaching
mindfulness. Her expansive heart and
expansive dreams energized us to be our best selves. We sincerely hope
that Jamie’s life will inspire you to take action now to make the world a more open,
safe, healthy, and loving place.  
To learn more about
Jamie's lifework, please check out her website and YouTube page.

story:
Montserrat Secondary School Association (MSSA) Launches “Giving - Back” Campaign to Raise $20,000US

The Montserrat Secondary School Association excited to launch our Educational Resources Giving-Back campaign to raise $20,000US (approximately £13,000). The main objective of this campaign is  to support the giving back initiative to aid youth development in Montserrat. The December 2015 deadline is to allow sufficient time for purchasing supplies and shipping to Montserrat. These supplies will then be presented to the staff and students at the Montserrat Secondary School.

ALL funds raised will be used to purchase much needed resources for the students and will support subjects including Geography, Information Technology, Art & Design, Spanish, P.E, and Biology.    

“We are excited about launching this giving- back fundraising campaign” says Miss Sandrene Ryan, President of Montserrat Secondary School Association.  

MSSA would like to take this opportunity to thank all of our supporters for their contribution to MSSA Educational Resources Giving-Back campaign.

The Montserrat Secondary School Association is a registered charity in Montserrat with the objective to work with the youths of Montserrat, by supporting the current Montserrat Secondary School Administration, through the donation of education equipment, which will allow for the creation of a modern day classroom.  Since the organisation launched, donations valued at more than $80,000EC have been presented to the Montserrat Secondary School Administration by the Montserrat Secondary School Association.

For further information about the Montserrat Secondary School Association, please visit: www.mssassociation.org  or contact President Sandrene Ryan Sandrene.Ryan@mssassociation.org or Vice President Gary Morton Gary.Morton@mssassociation.org and email: info@mssassociation.org.

story:
Who are we?

We are Team Kshatriya, a group of passionate engineering students from VIT University, Vellore. As a team, we believe in challenging the status quo with our innovation and hard work. We believe in doing things differently and it has elevated us to the top 3 teams in India for the past 2 years.

Driven by alacrity and passion, the team designs and builds an All Terrain Vehicle (ATV) and participates every year in one of the biggest inter-collegiate engineering events, “Baja SAE India”.

In 2015 we secured an overall rank of 3rd out of the 323 participating colleges with the following category results:

  2nd : CAE Award

  3rd : Sales Presentation

  3rd: Hill Climb

  5th : Endurance Race

  3rd : Overall

Established in 2006, we started with the objective of bringing together those brains which are diligently working on a myriad of inventive technologies, and to provide them with a forum for free exchange of ideas and expose them to the latest innovations in terms of automotive engineering. We are proud to have participated in Baja SAE India  2007 – 2015, Baja South Africa 2009 and Baja USA 2007.

Our Past Achievements

BAJA SAE INDIA 2014:

Overall: 3rd out of 357 teams 

1st Position: Build Quality                                   2nd Position: CAE Award

2nd Position: Acceleration                                 3rd Position: Endurance Race

BAJA SAE INDIA 2013:

Overall: 4th out of 261 teams 

1st Position: Hill Climb                                         1st Position: Engineering Aesthetics

2nd Position: Engineering Design                   2nd Position: Marketing & Business Plan

4th Position: Endurance Race                          7th Position: Acceleration

BAJA SAE INDIA 2012:

Overall: 8th out of 250 teams 

2nd Position:Engineering Design Award                       3rd Position: Maneuverability

2nd Position: Mahindra AQ Peer's Choice Award      Ambassador Of The Event

BAJA SAE INDIA 2011

Overall: 47th out of 250 teams 

4th Position: Acceleration                                   Ambassador of the Event

Best Engineering Design

The aim of the project is to design and fabricate a prototype of a rugged, single seat, off-road recreational vehicle. This ATV (All-terrain Vehicle) is then tested for its acceleration, maneuverability, gradability and endurance capabilities. 

Most importantly, we have knowledge and lessons learnt from mistakes and experiences passed on from senior members to juniors. We also share this experience and knowledge of ours with other aspiring teams. This is what makes us unique! Currently, we are gearing up for Baja SAE India 2016 and are looking forward to the challenge ahead!

With us, EXPERIENCE ENGINEERING!

About the event

The blazing sun, tingy dust and the exhilarating mud defines the 4 day spectacular event Baja SAE India, the largest motorsport gathering in the world with participation of over 8000 students.

Baja, a desert of Mexico's California Peninsula forms the concept of this event defining the ruthless conditions of its ecosystem. Baja SAE India is an intercollegiate design competition run by the Society of Automotive Engineers India(SAE India) with the objective to design and build off road buggies which are capable of  withstanding the harshest elements of any terrain encountered. About 150 Baja cars qualify for the final event in India and around the world where they are held (US, Brazil, South Africa and Korea). Venturing into unchartered territory of holding a mega-event of this scale, the Automotive Research Association of India (ARAI) and NATRiP came forward to lend a helping hand through an earmarked zone at its upcoming proving grounds – NATRAX Facility, situated at Pithampur, Indore, Madhya Pradesh that tests the vehicle for the sound engineering practices that have gone into it, the agility of the vehicle in terms of gradeability, speed, acceleration and manoeuvrability characteristics and finally its ability to endure that back breaking durability test.

Go green: Towards the green future

We here at Team Kshatriya are committed to promising efforts in saving the earth. The go green department of Team Kshatriya aims at finding new catalytic converters that are more economical than the conventional converters with higher efficiency of pollutant reduction. The catalytic converter will minimize CO and NOx emissions.The catalytic converter is modelled for optimization in small utility engines. The catalytic converter comprises of organic substances incorporating nanomaterials which replace the noble metals which are in use till date. The catalyst regenerates itself for the longer life of the same. The scope of application of our research is not restricted just to the ATVs but could also be extended to other vehicles with small capacity engines.

Electrical Optimisation

We aim at transferring the data collected by Data Acquisition system(Instantaneous speed of car, distance travelled by car, fuel level, tyre pressure and many more vital data ) wirelessly to our pit using a Radio Frequency module on the car. Checking the displacement of the shock absorbers in the suspension system of the car using high resolution and high range laser displacement sensors. Using IR sensors to measure the speed of engine RPM  and load flywheel RPM to correctly tune the continuous variable transmission system so as to provide maximum power throughput. 

Use of funds 

 The funds raised with this campaign will be used in the testing phase of the project, in BAJA SAE India, etc. The funds will help specifically in:

·  Performance optimisation of our vehicle by testing ( around 500$)

·  Event transportation and accommodation ( around 1500$)   

Why Crowdfunding?

Stretching our days to 18 hours we strive to develop a culture of innovation but fall short due to lack of funds. By securing 2 podium finishes and being in top 5 for the past 3 years we have emerged as one of the most consistent teams in the country. With your help and our passion, we can further improve our standards significantly, raise the bar for others and create alluring engineering talent for the automobile industry. We request your help and support in the form of funds to help us achieve our goals.

http://www.teamkshatriya.com/

story:
Il CNGEI è lo scautismo laico Italiano, l'educazione alle scelte, all'impegno e alla solidarietà.

A Gassino, Chivasso e San Mauro facciamo scautismo da oltre 25 anni.

Il nostro impegno quotidiano a fianco dei vostri ragazzi per costruire insieme una cittadinanza migliore: attiva, consapevole e responsabile, si scontra spesso con la carenza di supporto da parte delle istituzioni.


Abbiamo bisogno di voi, del vostro aiuto, di una vostra 'moneta' perché siamo convinti che il cambiamento parta dai piccoli gesti: i momenti vissuti, le esperienze condivise, le scelte fatte, diventando grandi giorno dopo giorno imparando la democrazia, la differenza, il rispetto e la bellezza dell'incontro.


Perché una 'moneta'?

Ti raccontiamo come il tuo contributo possa realmente cambiare le cose:

Scautismo aperto a tutti?

Tra i nostri ragazzi ci sono famiglie in difficoltà, per le quali un'uscita, uno zaino, un'uniforme sono spese spesso proibitive. Ma lo scautismo aperto a tutti non può fermarsi di fronte a questi limiti.

Un maglione costa circa 40 euro, una camicia circa 25, uno zaino intorno ai 100, spese indispensabili per 'essere scout' che possono diventare un'ostacolo.

Il tuo aiuto andrà a sostenere il fondo che la nostra Sezione stanzia ogni anno (da 25 anni) per le famiglie in difficoltà, un fondo ormai spesso insufficiente in questi tempi di crisi.

Vita all'aria aperta?

Uno dei nostri strumenti fondamentali per far vivere l'avventura ai nostri ragazzi, ma quando piove?

Alcune delle nostre sedi sono insufficienti ad accogliere il numero sempre crescente di ragazzi che si avvicinano a questa grande avventura, andrebbero sostituite o potenziate.

Altre sono adatte ma costose, tra affitti, acqua e manutenzione, spendiamo ogni anno circa 8.000 euro, spese che oggi sono difficili da sostenere per un'associazione basata sul volontariato puro.

Tutto col gioco, nulla per gioco.

I ragazzi e le ragazze che prestano volontariamente servizio nella nostra associazione partecipano ad un percorso di formazione.

Questo percorso dura due anni, prevede spostamenti, campi scuola, formatori.

I nostri capi imparano così, con l'impegno e la costanza a scrivere una programmazione educativa, a scegliere tra gli strumenti che lo scautismo offre, il più adatto per i bisogni dei vostri ragazzi, a capire l'importanza del loro lavoro e l'impatto di ogni singolo momento, nella crescita dei ragazzi.


In questa formazione noi crediamo profondamente, perché è la differenza tra 'far giocare i ragazzi' o 'crescere gli uomini e le donne di domani'.

Formare un capo costa circa 1000 euro e i nostri ragazzi sono spesso studenti o giovani lavoratori e faticano ad affrontare questa spesa, fatichiamo a sostenere queste spese, ma non vorremmo mai rinunciarvi.

Il tuo aiuto potrebbe aiutarci a sostenere uno scautismo sempre di qualità.


In cambio del tuo aiuto abbiamo pensato di lasciarti un pensiero, un ringraziamento che puoi visualizzare sulla destra. E' un pensiero carico di significato, perché mai come nello scautismo i simboli contano!



Ci sono tanti modi per aiutarci.

Le monete non sono l'unico modo per sostenerci, se non puoi fare una donazione, non significa che tu non possa aiutarci, anzi.

Lo scautismo è fatto di persone e per le persone, il tuo aiuto può essere fondamentale.

Se hai voglia di metterti in gioco, abbiamo bisogno di te:

  • come educatore e capo, 
  • come sostegno alle attività, 
  • con le tue abilità personali (cucina, bricolage, logistica, animazione),
  • con dei materiali per le nostre attività (cancelleria, materiale da trekking, tende o altro)

Contattaci all'indirizzo: scautismolaicopertutti.gassino@gmail.com
